meanings.sent1: The magician bewitches the audience with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent2: The fairy godmother bewitches the pumpkin into a beautiful carriage.
meanings.sent3: The witch bewitches her broom to sweep the floor on its own.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the music bewitches the listeners, transporting them to another world.
meanings.sent5: The enchanting aroma of the flowers bewitches the bees, drawing them in for nectar.

meanings.definition: Attract and hold the interest and attention of; charm
meanings.sent1: The storyteller bewitches the children with tales of adventure and magic.
meanings.sent2: The charismatic leader bewitches the crowd with his inspiring speeches.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy bewitches everyone in the park with its antics.
meanings.sent4: The painting bewitches the viewers, making them lose track of time.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling jewels in the display window bewitch passersby, making them stop and admire.
